Text: Bowthorpe is a suburban village to the west of Norwich, in the county of Norfolk, England.
Triplets:<Bowthorpe
1:
--------------------
Text: Bowthorpe:  It is primarily a residential area, but includes a large industrial estate (Bowthorpe Industrial Estate; occupied by mix-use commercial business, including the technology sector) and one small out-of-town shopping centre, containing a supermarket and various smaller retail outlets.
Triplets:<Bowthorpe
2:
--------------------
Text: Bowthorpe:  A police station and community hall are situated close to Bowthorpe village centre.
Triplets:<Bowthorpe
3:
--------------------
Text: Bowthorpe:  Most of present-day Bowthorpe has been developed from the 1970s onward.
